This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 



```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library (tidyverse)

data <- read_csv('./analysis/data/raw_data/database.csv')

chisq.test(data$typology, data$material )

table(data$typology, data$material)
data_combined<- as.data.frame(table(data$material, data$material))
data_combined<- data_combined %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = Var2, values_from = Freq) %>% 
  mutate(Q=Q1+ Q2+ Q3+Q4) %>% 
  select(Var1, BJ, GJ, RJ, Q)




data %>% 
  filter(typology %in% c('blade', 'f_blade')) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=length)) + geom_histogram()

tab_count<- data %>% 
  group_by(typology) %>% 
  summarise(counts=n()) %>% 
  mutate('%'= counts/sum(counts)*100, digits=2)

print(tab_count)


ggplot(data, aes(x=length)) + geom_histogram()


```
